data.text: @DrJinRussell @rawirimj My younger 3 kids have covid. Between the ages of 5 - 10. 😔
@DrJinRussell That's too bad. While it's fair to say we're all sick of the pandemic, there's no excuse for abuse. You're following the data.
@NotLinusTorvald Ha, cheers @NotLinusTorvald, am sort of used to this now

@DrJinRussell Hopefully in their home languages. I have bilingual teacher aides who do this for our school but, to my knowledge, the Ministry don't yet provide translations of the templates for notices they send to principals.

@DrJinRussell I think many parents would be surprised about some of these things, eg. there are many school bathrooms with no soap or hot water or paper towels (I know as I have recently worked as a reliever) .
@DrJinRussell Hugs in advance for the flack you'll be taking.
@DrJinRussell Thank you! This is really great info and an excellent starting point to put policy in place in Aotearoa. Should already have been done here but better late than never.
@DrJinRussell We aren't even getting told about covid cases in our school anymore, it's farcical.

@DrJinRussell Thanks Jin, I hope @EducationGovtNZ will take this on board. My understanding is they have advised schools not to give info to parents about numbers of covid cases or which classes are involved.
@DrJinRussell Breathing is an aerosol generating procedure.
